Wendy Elizabeth Lucas-Bull (née Adair; amụrụ n'afọ 1955) bụ nwanyị na-azụ ahịa na South Africa, onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ akụ na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ, onye na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Absa Group, nnukwu otu ọrụ ego nke Africa, nke nwere ụlọọrụ ndị ọzọ nọ n'okpuru ya na Botswana, Ghana, Kenya, Mauritius, Mozambique, Seychelles, South Africa, Tanzania, Uganda na Zambia.
A mụrụ Wendy n'ihe dị ka afọ 1955. Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ wee nweta nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand, n'afọ 1974.

Tupu a họpụta ya dị ka onye isi oche nke Absa Group na 2013, Lucas-Bull jere ozi dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke Rand Merchant Investment Holdings, tupu ọ rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke ngalaba azụmaahịa nke First Rand.
Wendy bụ otu n'ime mmadụ anọ ndị guzobere otu Peotona Group
Ha anọ so kwa na bọọdụ ụlọọrụ ahụ

Ọnọdụ ndị isi gara aga na azụmahịa gụnyere dị ka ndị nhazi na-abụghị ndị isi na Barclays, Anglo American Platinum Limited, Development Bank of Southern Africa, Alexander Forbes, Eskom, Nedbank, Telkom, Aveng, Lafarge Industries, South African Financial Markets Advisory Board, Discovery Holdings, Dimension Data Plc na Momentum Group.
Lucas-Bull jere ozi n'oge gara aga, dị ka onye otu President's Advisory Council on Black Economic Empowerment.
